name: María del Monte
description: '''María del Monte Tejado Algaba''' (born 26 April 1962 in [[Seville]], [[Andalusia]]) is a [[Spanish people|Spanish]] [[Spanish folklore|folk singer]] and TV and radio hostess. She's most known in [[Spain]] as "''La Reina de las [[Sevillanas]]''" (The Queen of the Sevillanas).
